alert.note: Alert for Eastern Greenbrier; Mercer; Monroe; Summers (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 7:10PM EST until December 24 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT... Dangerously cold wind chills are expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of northwest North Carolina, southwest and west central Virginia, and southeast West Virginia. * WHEN...Through 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind gusts of 30 to 40 mph can be expected through early Saturday.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of very cold air and strong winds will create dangerously low wind chill values. This will result in frost bite and lead to hypothermia or death if precautions are not taken. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
